name: Dirty Cop
description:
A new drug hits the city, you partner is murdered and now you are the prime suspect, will you keep yourself clean, or will you go dirty like everyone else? You choose.

A mix between Hotline Miami and a cop thriller.

You are a police officer that through his investigation will have moral choices to make, you can either arrest the suspects, or get high* on their supply while you execute them point blank, the choices you make will change the ending and how you play.

*Up to three drugs to use, all with different effects, baptized weed lets you see enemies trough walls, cocaine makes you tougher, and Noxyophine is the good old slow motion. Controls:

W,A,S,D - move.
E - Interact.
Spacebar - arrest stunned enemies.
F - Surrender enemies.
1,2,3 - Change selected drug.
Q - Use selected drug.
Left mouse button - Shoot/attack.
Right mouse button - Stun enemies with batton.
R - Restart level.
Esc - Exit game.

Made for the "Broken Pickaxe Jam 2022", the theme was "Dirty and Clean", my interpretation was to make a game where the player can trough his actions become a clean or dirty cop, these decisions can change the story and ending.

The game is in an early state, so everything is still subject to improvement. Also if you have any feedback, please leave it in the comments below!
